meanings.definition: Bad-tempered or unfriendly in a way that shows a lack of respect
meanings.sent1: The surlier cat hissed at anyone who came near.
meanings.sent2: She became surlier when she was tired and hungry.
meanings.sent3: The surlier customer demanded to speak to the manager.
meanings.sent4: His surlier attitude was like a dark cloud hanging over the room.
meanings.sent5: The surlier expression on his face made everyone uneasy.

meanings.definition: In a bad-tempered or unfriendly manner
meanings.sent1: He spoke surlier than usual after a long day at work.
meanings.sent2: She glared surlier than before when he interrupted her.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked surlier than usual at the mailman.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled surlier as the storm approached.
meanings.sent5: The old man grumbled surlier as he shuffled down the street.
